chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
p: pos n

Goal:
pos2nat p < n

Premises:
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
pos2nat : forall n : nat, pos n -> nat
Fin.of_nat_lt = fix of_nat_lt (p n : nat) {struct p} : p < n -> pos n := match n as n0 return (p < n0 -> pos n0) with | 0 => fun H : p < 0 => False_rect (pos 0) (Nat.nlt_0_r p H) | S n' => match p as p0 return (p0 < S n' -> pos (S n')) with | 0 => fun _ : 0 < S n' => pos0 | S p' => fun H : S p' < S n' => pos_nxt (of_nat_lt p' n' (lt_S_n p' n' H)) end end : forall p n : nat, p < n -> pos n Arguments Fin.of_nat_lt {p n}%nat_scope
Nat.lt_le_trans : forall n m p : nat, n < m -> m <= p -> n < p
Nat.le_lt_trans : forall n m p : nat, n <= m -> m < p -> n < p
Nat.add_lt_cases : forall n m p q : nat, n + m < p + q -> n < p \/ m < q
Nat.lt_1_l' : forall n m p : nat, n < m -> m < p -> 1 < p
lt_wf_double_rect : forall P : nat -> nat -> Type, (forall n m : nat, (forall p q : nat, p < n -> P p q) -> (forall p : nat, p < m -> P n p) -> P n m) -> forall n m : nat, P n m
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.of_nat : forall p n : nat, pos n + {exists m : nat, p = n + m}
Fin.rectS : forall P : forall n : nat, pos (S n) -> Type, (forall n : nat, P n pos0) -> (forall (n : nat) (p : pos (S n)), P n p -> P (S n) (pos_nxt p)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : pos (S n)), P n p
pos_both_lr : forall (n m : nat) (p : pos n + pos m), pos_both n m (pos_lr p) = p
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 -> VectorDef.t ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type]
Fin.weak : forall p0 : nat, (pos ?m -> pos ?n) -> pos (p0 + ?m) -> pos (p0 + ?n) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.eqb_nat_eq : forall (m n : nat) (p : pos m) (q : pos n), Fin.eqb p q = true -> m = n
pos_nat : forall n : nat, pos n -> {i : nat | i < n}
Nat.lt_1_l : forall n m : nat, 0 < n -> n < m -> 1 < m
pos_both_right : forall (n m : nat) (p : pos m), pos_both n m (pos_right n p) = inr p
Nat.add_assoc : forall n m p : nat, n + (m + p) = n + m + p
pos_left_right_rect : forall (n m : nat) (P : pos (n + m) -> Type), (forall p : pos n, P (pos_left m p)) -> (forall p : pos m, P (pos_right n p)) -> forall p : pos (n + m), P p
Fin.caseS : forall P : forall n : nat, pos (S n) -> Type, (forall n : nat, P n pos0) -> (forall (n : nat) (p : pos n), P n (pos_nxt p)) -> forall (n : nat) (p : pos (S n)), P n p
Nat.add_pos_cases : forall n m : nat, 0 < n + m -> 0 < n \/ 0 < m
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type]
Nat.lt_pred_lt : forall n m : nat, n < Nat.pred m -> n < m
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
lt_S_n : forall n m : nat, S n < S m -> n < m
lt_n_S : forall n m : nat, n < m -> S n < S m
Nat.succ_lt_mono : forall n m : nat, n < m < -> S n < S m
Nat.lt_dne : forall n m : nat, ~ ~ n < m < -> n < m
Fin.depair_sanity : forall (o : pos ?m) (p0 : pos ?n), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.depair o p0)) = ?n * proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat o) + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p0) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat] ?n : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
pos_O_inv = let pos_inv_t := fun n : nat => match n as x return (pos x -> Set) with | 0 => fun _ : pos 0 => False | S n0 => fun i : pos (S n0) => ((i = pos0) + {p : pos n0 | i = pos_nxt p})%type end in let pos_inv := fun (_tmp : nat) (p0 : pos _tmp) => match p0 as t in (pos n) return (pos_inv_t n t) with | @Fin.F1 n => inl eq_refl | @Fin.FS n p => inr (exist (fun p1 : pos n => pos_nxt p = pos_nxt p1) p eq_refl) end in pos_inv 0 : pos 0 -> False
Nat.log2_spec : forall n : nat, 0 < n -> 2 ^ Nat.log2 n <= n < 2 ^ S (Nat.log2 n)
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : pos m) {struct n} : {i : nat | i < m} := match n in (pos n0) return {i : nat | i < n0} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => i < S j) 0 (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => i0 < S n0) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, pos m -> {i : nat | i < m} Arguments Fin.to_nat {m}%nat_scope
Nat.lt_succ_diag_r : forall n : nat, n < S n
FinFun.Fin2Restrict.f2n_ok : forall (n : nat) (x : pos n), FinFun.Fin2Restrict.f2n x < n
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (w : VectorDef.t ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type]
Fin.L : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (?m + n0) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [n : nat p : pos n |- nat]
Fin.depair = fix depair (m n : nat) (o : pos m) (p : pos n) {struct o} : pos (m * n) := match o in (pos n0) return (pos (n0 * n)) with | @Fin.F1 m' => Fin.L (m' * n) p | @Fin.FS n0 o' => Fin.R n (depair n0 n o' p) end : forall m n : nat, pos m -> pos n -> pos (m * n) Arguments Fin.depair {m n}%nat_scope
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) where ?A : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat p : pos n |- Type]
Nat.lt_neq : forall n m : nat, n < m -> n <> m

``` 
unfold pos2nat. apply Nat.lt_le_trans with n.
- destruct p. apply lt_n_S. apply Nat.lt_succ_diag_r.
- apply Nat.lt_neq. apply Fin.FS.
```
